title: Reddit bans r/thedonald for hate speech

constellations_other.name: Fake news: too little too late
constellations_other.description: Unbound Creationsâ€™ Headliner: NoviNews explores the impact of the media and fake news on society, something that is fast becoming one of the biggest concerns of our age.

description: Popular anonymous social media site Reddit bans r/thedonald, one of it’s channels (or subreddits) for the alt-right and supporters of Trump due to racism and hate-speech.
description_for_label: Popular anonymous social media site Reddit bans r/thedonald, one of it’s channels (or subreddits) for the alt-right and supporters of Trump due to racism and hate-speech.
